doc:
Margaret Illington https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Illington 0 Margaret Illington ill-ing-ton (July 23, 1879 – March 11, 1934) was an American stage actress popular in the first decade of the 20th century. She later made an attempt at silent film acting by making two films with Adolph Zukor's Famous Players-Lasky franchise. After her film and theater career were over she settled down as the wife of Major Edward Bowes, her second husband whom she married in 1910. There were no children with either husband. Margaret_Illington_ill-ing-ton ( July_23 , 1879 – March_11_,_1934 ) was an_American_stage_actress popular in the_first_decade of the_20th_century . She later made an_attempt at silent_film acting by making two_films with Adolph_Zukor 's_Famous_Players-Lasky_franchise . After her_film_and_theater_career were over she settled down as the_wife of Major_Edward_Bowes , her_second_husband whom she married in 1910 . There were no_children with either husband .
